remarks: Elementhood in ` O ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Apr-2017.)
statement:
ballotth.m $e |- M e. NN $.
ballotth.n $e |- N e. NN $.
ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
ballotlemelo $p |- ( C e. O <-> ( C C_ ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) /\ ( # ` C ) = M ) ) $.
$d M c $.
$d N c $.
$d O c $.
